entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Windsor
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:19 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 4.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Windsor Airport 11:36 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 4.7°C
Pressure: 101.1 kPa
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 4.4°C
Wind: SSE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Wednesday night: Drizzle or rain. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Drizzle or showers beginning near midnight. Fog patches developing after midnight. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 5:03 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Drizzle or rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Drizzle or showers changing to rain near noon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 late in the morning. High plus 5. Forecast issued 5:03 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain mixed with snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain mixed with snow. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 5:03 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
